meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6501.

td.p: Theresa Anderson, a clothing sales associate from Valrico, Florida
Susan Jann, an operations coordinator from Bristol, Pennsylvania
Alistair Bell, a computer chip designer from Berlin, Massachusetts (whose 3-day cash winnings total $56,800)

tr.td: THE CHRISTMAS SPIRIT
GO AHEAD... MAKE MY CAR
CHILDREN'S LITERATURE
MOVIE MISSING LINKS
MATH FUN
FROM B TO SHINING B
